backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-coin wallet backend with transaction history, contacts, user profiles, balances vault, and access control using MixinAuthorization and AccessControl modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting UI component size reduction from large to medium scale across buttons, cards, inputs, and text elements with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, utilities, and configuration with details on authentication, validation, styling, and medium-scale UI adjustments.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title 'Infinity Wallet', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Smoke test checklist covering connection flow, profile setup, dashboard rendering, navigation, send/receive flows, contacts CRUD, and address format validation for post-deployment testing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing Internet Identity authentication flow, profile setup dialog, page routing (dashboard/send/contacts/history/receive/contracts), loading states, and error handling with AppLayout wrapper.
Medium-sized authentication button (h-7, text-xs) for Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out with loading spinner, error recovery, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Compact principal display component (text-xs, h-5 w-5 button) with optional truncation and copy-to-clipboard functionality with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name to complete profile setup, with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Modal dialog for creating or editing contacts with name and address fields, including validation for ICP addresses and principals.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary component that catches and displays application errors with a reload button and error details.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation bar, and page routing for dashboard, send, receive, contacts, history, and contracts pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Displays the wallet logo image with gradient text overlay and the application name from branding configuration.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceCa: Card component displaying token balance with icon, USD value, loading states, error handling, and manual refresh button.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BitcoinDe: Alert component that displays pending Bitcoin deposit status with refresh functionality when ckBTC minting is in progress.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BitcoinFe: Alert component showing Bitcoin network fee information in satoshis and BTC, with processing time details for withdrawals.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover component with searchable contact list that allows users to select a recipient address from their saved contacts.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TotalAsse: Displays total wallet assets across multiple tokens (Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) with selectable denomination (USD or any token), calculating values using exchange rates.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TransferM: Radio group component for selecting between wrapped (ICRC-1) and native Bitcoin transfer modes, showing speed and fee differences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcBalance.ts: Fetches ckBTC balance from the ICRC-1 ledger using the user's principal and default account, with comprehensive debug logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcDepositAddres: Queries the ckBTC minter to get the user's Bitcoin deposit address, handling mainnet-only availability and local development errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcDepositStatus: Checks for pending Bitcoin deposits by calling the minter's update_balance method, parsing UTXO statuses and confirmations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcLedger.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated ckBTC ICRC-1 ledger client, initializing it when identity is available with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcMinter.ts: Creates and manages a ckBTC minter client instance based on the user's identity, handling initialization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcMinterInfo.ts: Queries the ckBTC minter for configuration info (fees, limits, etc.) with 5-minute cache and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcWithdraw.ts: Mutation hook for withdrawing ckBTC to native Bitcoin addresses via the minter, invalidating balance and transaction queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcWithdrawalSta: React Query hook that polls ckBTC withdrawal status by block index every 10 seconds until confirmed, using the ckBTC minter client.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckETH balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with extensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckETH ICRC-1 ledger client based on Internet Identity authentication state with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckSOL balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with comprehensive debugging output.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolLedger.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated ckSOL ICRC-1 ledger client tied to Internet Identity login status with extensive logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useExchangeRates.ts: React Query hook that fetches and parses exchange rates for ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, and Infinity Coin from ICPSwap API, converting ICP-denominated rates to USD.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ICP balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with detailed console debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and maintains an authenticated ICP ICRC-1 ledger client synchronized with Internet Identity authentication state, including comprehensive logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityCoinBalanc: React Query hook that fetches the user's Infinity Coin balance from the ICRC-1 ledger, with extensive console logging for debugging identity, account construction, and balance fetch operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityLedger.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated Infinity Coin ledger client, initializing it when identity is available and verifying actor methods with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, transaction history, and contacts management, using the backend actor with mutations that invalidate queries and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark cosmic theme, neon glow utilities (cyan, purple, magenta), and animated starfield background effects.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports application name and token symbol constants including ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, and Infinity Coin.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/client.ts: ICRC-1 ledger client for ckBTC with TypeScript types, IDL factory, and authenticated actor creation using HttpAgent with comprehensive debugging logs.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckBTC ICRC-1 ledger canister ID constant as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckBTC ledger configuration, client creation functions, utility functions, and TypeScript types from the ckBtcLedger module.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/client.ts: Defines TypeScript types and IDL factory for the ckBTC minter canister, providing interfaces for Bitcoin address generation, balance updates, BTC retrieval, and minter info queries.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/config.ts: Exports the official ckBTC minter canister ID for mainnet.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/index.ts: Re-exports all configuration and client functionality from the ckBtcMinter module.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 ledger client for ckETH with comprehensive debugging, providing balance queries, transfers, and metadata functions using the Dfinity agent.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckETH ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckETH ledger configuration, client creation functions, and all ICRC-1 types.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 ledger client for ckSOL with debugging support, mirroring the ckETH client structure for balance queries, transfers, and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckSOL ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckSOL ledger configuration, client creation functions, and all ICRC-1 types.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Provides utility functions to derive ICP Ledger Account Identifiers from Principals using SHA-224 hashing and CRC32 checksums.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 ledger client for ICP with debugging support, providing balance queries, transfers, fee queries, and metadata functions.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/config.ts: Exports the ICP ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ICP ledger configuration, client creation functions, and all ICRC-1 types.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/client.t: Defines ICRC-1 ledger client for Infinity Coin with TypeScript interfaces, IDL factory, and authenticated actor creation with comprehensive debugging and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/config.t: Exports the Infinity Coin ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as a single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/index.ts: Re-exports Infinity Coin ledger configuration, client functions, and TypeScript types for external consumption.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for CSS class merging, principal truncation, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains validation functions for ICP, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana addresses, plus amount parsing and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays and manages user contacts with add, edit, and delete functionality using dialogs and confirmation alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Provides UI for calling canister methods with authentication check, form inputs for canister ID, method name, and JSON arguments.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying total assets, individual token balances (Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) with USD values, and Bitcoin deposit status.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Transaction history page that displays filtered transaction records with token icons, supports filtering by token type, and includes refresh functionality with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: Receive page displaying user's Principal address for ICRC-1 tokens and native Bitcoin deposit address with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Send page implementing multi-token transfer functionality with wrapped/native mode selection, recipient validation, amount input, confirmation flow, and integration with multiple ledger hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom font sizes, spacing scale, OKLCH color system with CSS variables, border radius, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a feature request to reduce UI component sizes from large to medium across the application.
